name: Dropbox
description: Dropbox is a modern workspace designed to reduce busywork-so you can focus on the things that matter.

name: Skype
description: You can make video and audio calls, exchange chat messages and do much more using Skype application.

name: Hangouts
description: Hangouts bring conversations to life with photos, emoji, and even group video calls for free.

name: Asana
description: Track your team's work & manage projects.

name: Marvel
description: The collaborative design platform. Wireframe, prototype, design online and create design specs in one place.

description: Get your apps and devices working together.

name: Github
description: GitHub brings together the world's largest community of developers to discover, share, and build better software.
